actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to prevent the retroactive assessment of certain deficiencies in the case of employees of the Panama Canal Zone Government or the Panama Canal Company.

summary.text: Excludes from gross income amounts paid for lodging before October 1, 1979, by employees of the Panama Canal Zone Government or of the Panama Canal Zone Company.

titles.title: A bill to prevent the retroactive assessment of certain deficiencies in the case of employees of the Panama Canal Zone Government or the Panama Canal Company.
